articles.title: Entegris (ENTG) Management Confident in Future Growth Despite Bearish Sentiment from Goldman Sachs

articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Entegris (ENTG) Management Confident in Future Growth Despite Bearish Sentiment from Goldman Sachs. Entegris, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENTG) is included in our list of the best rising tech stocks to buy now. On December 15, TheFly reported that Goldman Sachs downgraded Entegris, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENTG) from “Neutral” to “Sell,” reducing the price target from $88 to $75. The firm revisited the stock while revising its 2026 outlook for semiconductor stocks. It expects hyperscaler […] Related tickers mentioned: ENTG.

articles.title: Goldman Sachs’s Private-Credit Company Struggles to Clean Up Soured Bets
articles.mainIdea: Goldman Sachs’s Private-Credit Company Struggles to Clean Up Soured Bets
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Goldman Sachs’s Private-Credit Company Struggles to Clean Up Soured Bets. Goldman Sachs has been trying to clean up a mess inside its publicly traded private-lending company for more than three years. The bank’s business-development company, Goldman Sachs BDC is primarily a lender to middle-market corporations. Thanks to souring loans, the per share value of Goldman BDC’s holdings has slid for seven straight quarters and its stock price has fallen even further. Related tickers mentioned: GSBD.

articles.title: Goldman Sachs expects layoffs to keep rising—and says investors are punishing the stocks of companies that slash staff

articles.summary: Fortune: Goldman Sachs expects layoffs to keep rising—and says investors are punishing the stocks of companies that slash staff. Analysts ran the numbers and found a surprising change in how investors are reacting to layoff announcements.

articles.title: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For loanDepot Now
articles.mainIdea: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For loanDepot Now
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For loanDepot Now. loanDepot’s latest price target revision has drawn fresh attention to how investors are recalibrating expectations around the lender’s future. While the fair value estimate and core assumptions like discount rate and revenue growth remain largely intact, the higher target reflects a delicate balance between optimism on execution and lingering doubts about long term momentum. Read on to see how you can track these shifting expectations over time and stay ahead of the evolving... Related tickers mentioned: LDI.
